sentence.Network_en: I'm afraid your son had a slight mishap in the playground.
sentence.Network_cn: 不好了,你儿子在操场上出了点小意外.

sentence.Network_en: With a little care you could have avoided the mishap.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要是小心一点,本来是可以避免这场不测之祸的.

list.abs: it is true the Guild once murdered a girl under the guise a medical mishap .的确，组织曾经以医疗过失作为伪装，藉此杀了一个女孩。
You must try to see these mishaps in proportion ., 你应当理智地对待这些不幸的事情.
your claim shall is refer to the insurance company as mishap occur after shipment .您的索赔应提交保险公司，因为损失发生在装船之后。
With a little care you could have avoided this mishap ., 你如果稍微小心一点 , 就可以避免这次不幸.

entry.def: A mishap is an unfortunate but not very serious event that happens to someone.

example.ex: After a number of mishaps she did manage to get back to Germany...
example.tran: 经历了一番波折之后，她终于设法返回德国。

example.ex: The plot passed off without mishap.

means.word_mean: 1. an unpredictable outcome that is unfortunate;

sentences.sentence: "if I didn't have bad luck I wouldn't have any luck at all"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 偶然的,无计划的,随意的,杂乱无章的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hap机会,运气+hazard冒险的事,游戏→运气加游戏→偶然的
hap机会,运气+less无→无运气的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 快乐的,幸福的;乐意的;令人满意的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hap机会,运气+y……的→happy有运气的→幸福的
per全部+hap机会,运气+s表复数→全部都是机会,运气[决定]
hap机会,运气+hazard冒险的事,游戏→运气加游戏→偶然的
happy[adj.快乐的,幸福的;乐意的;令人满意的]+ness性质,状态→happiness幸福,幸运
mis错过+hap运气→运气不好
hap机会,运气+en表动词→happen机会来了→发生
mis错误,厌恶,错过+chiev＝chief首领+ous……的→做坏事的首领
mis错误,厌恶,错过+anthrop人+e→不喜欢人

mis错误,厌恶,错过+demeanor行为→n.轻罪
mis错误,厌恶,错过+doing做事→n.坏事
mis错误,厌恶,错过+fortune幸运的→n.不幸
mis错误,厌恶,错过+hap运气→运气不好

mis错误,厌恶,错过+take拿→拿错→错误
